title: Release Rollout Plan Analysis
description: Analyze and optimize release rollout plans
example_prompt: Analyze our release rollout plan. Check dependencies, timing, resource allocation, and risk factors. Suggest optimizations for smoother deployment.

environmentVariables.name: roll_plan_path
environmentVariables.description: Path to the ROLL plan XML file to analyze

environmentVariables.name: reference_plan_path
environmentVariables.description: Path to the reference ROLL plan XML file (optional)
